name: Allison Massari
professionalTitle: Personal Development Expert, Trusted Executive Coach
bio: Allison Massari, award-winning painter and sculptor, was hit at 60 mph, twice, burned alive in a fire, barely escaped death and later sustained a traumatic brain injury. Through it all she found happiness, success and a fire within. Her extraordinary story captivates-and motivates-audiences, making her one of the most sought-after speakers and coaches.
